channel.title: Knights on Wires
channel.description: In knights on Wires Peter, Johan and Robin (and other visiting friends) talk about what they're busy with. Tune in to hear about the ins and outs of JavaScript, Java, Ruby, Postgres, AWS, Azure and maybe even the occasional CNC machine!
channel.itunes:author: Knightec Dewire
channel.itunes:summary: In knights on Wires Peter, Johan and Robin (and other visiting friends) talk about what they're busy with. Tune in to hear about the ins and outs of JavaScript, Java, Ruby, Postgres, AWS, Azure and maybe even the occasional CNC machine!

item.title: 000: Knights on Wires Pod Trailer
item.author: Knightec Dewire
item.itunes:author: Knightec Dewire
item.itunes:subtitle: New podcast trailer!
item.description:
New podcast trailer!
Welcome!
Hi there!
My name is Peter van der Meulen and together with Johan Deckmar and Robin Rosenberg we’re starting a podcast.
We’re all software developers at Knightec in Sweden and in the coming few months we’d love you take you with us on our coding adventures.
Every other week we’ll try to tune in to talk about what we’ve been busy with and what challenges we faced or are facing.
We are recording our first session in the next few days, so stay tuned for Episode 1!
Look for “Knighs on wires” wherever you listen to podcasts!
Links
Knights on wires website

New podcast trailer!

We are recording our first session in the next few days, so stay tuned for Episode 1!

item.title: 001: Lakes and buns
item.author: Knightec Dewire
item.itunes:author: Knightec Dewire
item.itunes:subtitle: Our first episode! Johan, Robin and Peter talk about bun.sh, high frequency data and data lakes
item.description:
Our first episode! Johan, Robin and Peter talk about bun.sh, high frequency data and data lakes
Links
Knights on wires website Fireship bun.sh Bun High frequency data PlantUML Amazon Web Services
Special thanks
Theme music remixed from tunes by Alexi Action and TuesdayNight
Mixing and editing by Peter vd Meulen
AI album art by Joel Olofsson.
This podcast is produced by folks working at Knightec, your strategic partner in product and service development. Learn more and contact us at knightec.se/
Questions or suggestions? contact us!

Our first episode! Johan, Robin and Peter talk about bun.sh, high frequency data and data lakes
